category: Safety and Health Management Regulations/Article 29 (Traffic Accident Prevention)
contents: Article 29 (Traffic Disaster Prevention) ① All vehicles traveling within the complex must use vehicle passageways and adhere to the speed limit (within 20 km). Revised December 22, 2021., ② Workers and customers entering the industrial complex must use marked pedestrian passages and crossing places to prevent accidents caused by moving vehicles., ③ Workers must follow the “road rules” when driving a vehicle for work. You must drive safely in compliance with relevant laws and regulations, including the Traffic Act.
